constituent: hair of the head, hairstyle, hair, shape, friend
koohiiStory1: Japanese teenage girls consider the style of the hair of the head very important. If a particular style is trendy, soon they all want their own hair in the same shape as that of their friends.
koohiiStory2: Friends influence the length and shape of each other´s hair.
words:
髪(かみ): hair
髪の毛(かみのけ): hair (on head)
白髪(しらが): white or grey hair, trendy hair bleaching
